Alchemical: Choking, Fumes in sealed jar, Broken open
Soothing, Emollient salve, Rubbed on skin
Tool: Set of Dice, Scaled hide, Balanced

magicItemEffects.function: Grants bonus or ability to enhance actions
Boosts a skill, sense, or stat
Creates light, energy, or simple matter

magicItemCurseStatus.description: This item has a full-blown curse.
The item has a subtle drawback or minor inconvenience.
Initially helpful, but the curse reveals itself under a condition.
Not currently cursed, but bears a cursed history or residue.
No curse exists, but it appears cursed.
The item is protected against curses.

magicItemCurseSigns: Unsettling sensation — a chill, nausea, or static prickle
Subtle resistance — feels heavier or vibrates faintly
Whispered echo — a faint voice no one else hears
Strange reaction — fire sputters, animals shy away, shadows bend
Unnatural aura — unstable, flickering magical signature
Disrupted sleep — vivid nightmares or restless sleep

magicItemCurseEffects.effect: Cannot be removed without a specific ritual
Saps strength, stamina, or magic slowly
Emits a faint glow or scent visible to enemies
Turns against the wielder in key moments
Urges the user to perform an act
Slowly corrupts or decays physical form
Reflects negative effects on the user
Functions as a boon, then fails at a key time
